title: RSMA-Enhanced Data Collection in RIS-Assisted Intelligent Consumer Transportation Systems
summary: This paper investigates data collection enhancement in a reconfigurable intelligent surface (RIS)-empowered intelligent consumer transportation system (ICTS). It proposes a framework where a data center provides energy to roadside unit pairs during downlink, and these pairs use a hybrid RSMA and TDMA protocol for uplink data transmission.
usefulness_reason: The paper discusses data collection in intelligent transportation systems, which inherently involves spatio-temporal data. While it doesn't explicitly mention 'point process', the context of data collection in a dynamic spatial system makes it relevant to 'Spatio Temporal' and 'Contextual dataset'.
